exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BattleHpBarSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="150" height="15">
	<e:Image verticalCenter="0" source="img_bar_bg_icon_png" width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="12,1,76,8"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" source="img_bar_icon_png" width="146" height="10" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-0.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BattleSkillButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="normalDisplay" width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
	         source="0D_png" includeIn="up,disabled"/>
	<e:Image id="downDisplay" width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
	         source="0H_png" includeIn="down"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="74"
	         size="20" fontFamily="楷体"
	         verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0x000000" text="火球术" width="130" strokeColor="0xD8D0B0" stroke="1" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BattleSceneSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image source="img_bg_battle_png" scaleX="3.3" scaleY="3.3" y="0" x="0"/>
	<e:Image source="img_bg_hp_enemy_png" x="40" y="30" scaleX="3.3" scaleY="3.3"/>
	<e:Image source="img_bg_hp_own_png" x="428" y="254.1" scaleX="3.3" scaleY="3.3"/>
	<e:ProgressBar id="bar_enemy_hp" x="168" y="84" skinName="BattleHpBarSkin" value="100"/>
	<e:ProgressBar id="bar_own_hp" value="100" skinName="BattleHpBarSkin" y="308" x="587"/>
	<e:Label id="label_enemy_lv" text="99" x="308" y="50" width="27" height="20" size="24" textColor="0x000000" stroke="1" strokeColor="0xD8D0B0"/>
	<e:Label id="label_enemy_name" y="48" textColor="0x000000" height="26" text="妙蛙种子" x="60" width="150" stroke="1" size="24" strokeColor="0xD8D0B0" bold="true" fontFamily="楷体" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="label_own_lv" y="274" textColor="0x000000" height="20" text="99" width="27" stroke="1" size="24" strokeColor="0xD8D0B0" x="726"/>
	<e:Label id="label_own_name" textColor="0x000000" text="妙蛙种子" fontFamily="楷体" bold="true" stroke="1" size="24" strokeColor="0xD8D0B0" x="480" y="272" width="150" height="26" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="label_own_cur_hp" y="329.5" textColor="0x000000" size="24" text="1000" x="610" width="60" stroke="1" height="20" strokeColor="0xD8D0B0" textAlign="right"/>
	<e:Label id="label_own_max_hp" y="329.5" textColor="0x000000" height="20" text="1000" stroke="1" size="24" strokeColor="0xD8D0B0" x="690"/>
	<e:Image id="img_enemy_monster" x="495" y="41" scaleX="2" scaleY="2" source="3_front_png"/>
	<e:Image id="img_own_monster" x="120" y="180" scaleX="2" scaleY="2" source="3_back_png"/>
	
	<e:Group id="group_operate" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="img_bg_operate_png" y="376" scale9Grid="29,5,174,34" width="330" height="103" x="468.5999999999999"/>
		<e:Image source="img_bg_operate_png" x="0" y="376" scale9Grid="29,5,174,34" width="460" height="103"/>
		<e:Label text="一般" x="618" y="441" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="楷体" bold="true" stroke="1" size="24" strokeColor="0xD8D0B0"/>
		<e:Label text="属性：" x="523" y="441" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="楷体" bold="true" stroke="1" size="24" strokeColor="0xD8D0B0"/>
		<e:Label text="999/999" x="618" y="398" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="楷体" bold="true" stroke="1" size="24" strokeColor="0xD8D0B0"/>
		<e:Label text="PP" x="523" y="398" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="楷体" bold="true" stroke="1" size="24" strokeColor="0xD8D0B0"/>
		<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_skill1" label="火球术" x="35" y="380" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75"/>
		<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_skill3" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" y="430" scaleX="0.75" label="火球术" scaleY="0.75" x="35"/>
		<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_skill2" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" y="380" scaleX="0.75" label="火球术" scaleY="0.75" x="250"/>
		<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_skill4" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" y="429.5" scaleX="0.75" label="火球术" scaleY="0.75" x="250"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_desc">
		<e:Image source="img_bg_text_png" x="2" y="380" width="795" height="99" scale9Grid="29,5,180,36"/>
		<e:Label id="label_desc" x="12" y="390" width="775" height="80"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultSceneSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="label_result" text="战斗胜利" x="200" y="190" size="100" stroke="1" strokeColor="0x000000" bold="true" fontFamily="楷体" textColor="0xFFFFFF"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSkillListSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="img_mask_s1_png" width="800" height="480"/>
	<e:Scroller id="scroller_skill" width="800" height="480">
		<e:Group>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameEditorSceneSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label text="我方ID" x="44" y="70" size="18" width="60"/>
	<e:TextInput id="txt_own" x="44" y="101" width="60" height="30" restrict="0-9"/>
	<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_own_skill1" label="技能1" x="272" y="41" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" normal="17D_png" down="17H_png"/>
	<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_own_skill2" y="41" label="技能2" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" x="506" normal="17D_png" down="17H_png"/>
	<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_own_skill3" y="118" label="技能3" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" x="272" normal="17D_png" down="17H_png"/>
	<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_own_skill4" y="118" label="技能4" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" x="506" normal="17D_png" down="17H_png"/>
	<e:Label width="60" y="250" size="18" text="敌方ID" x="43"/>
	<e:TextInput id="txt_enemy" width="60" y="281" height="30" x="43" restrict="0-9"/>
	<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_enemy_skill1" y="215" label="技能1" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" x="271" normal="17D_png" down="17H_png"/>
	<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_enemy_skill2" y="215" label="技能2" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" x="505" normal="17D_png" down="17H_png"/>
	<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_enemy_skill3" y="292" label="技能3" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" x="271" normal="17D_png" down="17H_png"/>
	<ns1:BattleSkillButton id="btn_enemy_skill4" y="292" label="技能4" skinName="BattleSkillButtonSkin" x="505" normal="17D_png" down="17H_png"/>
	<e:Label text="ps:ID可以是1-649任何编号的口袋妖怪" x="43" y="428" size="18" textColor="0xFF0000"/>
	<e:Image id="image_own_monster" source="0_png" x="143" y="82"/>
	<e:Image id="image_enemy_monster" source="0_png" y="262" x="133"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_battle" label="对战" x="621" y="412"/>
	<ns1:GameSkillList id="list_skill" skinName="GameSkillListSkin" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSkillItemSkin" width="800" height="60" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="800" height="60" source="border_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_id" text="ID" x="7" y="15" width="37" height="30" textColor="0x000000" border="false"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_name" text="名称" x="50" y="16" textColor="0x000000" border="false"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_damage" text="伤害值" x="178" y="16" textColor="0x000000" border="false"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_type" y="16" text="攻击方式" x="366" textColor="0x000000" border="false"/>
	<e:Label id="txt_series" y="16" text="属性" x="628" textColor="0x000000" border="false"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_confirm" label="选择" x="700" y="5"/>
	<e:Image source="img_mask_s1_png" x="45" height="60" width="3"/>
	<e:Image source="img_mask_s1_png" width="3" height="60" x="170"/>
	<e:Image source="img_mask_s1_png" width="3" height="60" x="360"/>
	<e:Image source="img_mask_s1_png" width="3" height="60" x="625"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SkillEditorSceneSkin" width="800" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Button id="btn_play" label="播放" x="672" y="140"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_stop" y="81" label="暂停" x="672"/>
	<e:TextInput id="txt_input_skill" x="672" y="32" width="100"/>
</e:Skin>
